images.alt_text: AI-selected These seasonal images will highlight the beauty of spring in Greece, featuring spring flowers, sunny beaches, and local cuisine, enhancing the overall campaign theme.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Greece in spring
assetRequirements.visual_style: bright, colorful, showcasing spring landscapes and cultural elements
assetRequirements.content_context: depict blooming nature, ancient ruins, and vibrant local cuisine

assetRequirements.purpose: highlight Greece's unique features and attractions
assetRequirements.visual_style: images of historical sites and scenic views
assetRequirements.content_context: focus on iconic landmarks and serene landscapes

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Весна в Греции ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected These seasonal images will highlight the beauty of spring in Greece, featuring spring flowers, sunny beaches, and local cuisine, enhancing the overall campaign theme.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
